comments.body: I don't think it's necessary to test the types and return value of a static arrow function written for a test.

Do you mean I should get rid of both `// $ExpectType` lines? I think those are the ones that enforce that the changes in this PR work.

I added the lines in response to a previous review: https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/46922#discussion_r474110604 but can get rid of them if you prefer. (But without them, I donâ€™t think the `R.map` lines tests anything.)
